double flintmax >>

double

Converts a variable to double precision type.

Syntax

D = double(V)

Input argument

V

a variable.

Output argument

D

a double.

Description

double(V) converts to the double-precision type.

Examples

double('Nelson')


A = single(pi)
B = double(A)
B - A


A = ["3.134", "NaN"; "Inf", "-5"];
B = double(A)

See also

char, single.

History

Version Description
1.0.0 initial version

Author

Allan CORNET
